title: fix(social): upload Discord images as file attachments
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Picture perfect delivery
gist.blurb: Our Discord bot learned a new trick: uploading images directly to ensure they always show up in your feed.
gist.summary: Updated Discord notification scripts to upload images as file attachments instead of using embed URLs to resolve display issues.
gist.impact: Discord announcements will now reliably display the generated images.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee placing a physical photo into a digital mailbox or frame, representing the switch to file attachments.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee placing a polaroid photo into a digital mailbox. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi vibes like Unpacking. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny robot placing a photo into a frame on a wall. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. The pollinations.ai bee watches happily. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
